mapper.sql: a.srl_no, a.wh_id, d.wh_name, a.mat_no, b.mat_name, a.ven_sn, a.fa_no, a.rcv_date, a.mat_status, a.site_id, c.site_name, a.discard_date, a.discard_no, a.cr_user, a.cr_time, a.md_user, a.md_time, a.tag_no, b.ctrl_type, b.is_asset, isnull(e.name, a.mat_status) mat_status_dscr, isnull(a.site_id, a.wh_id) s_site_id, case when a.site_id is not null then isnull(c.site_name, a.site_id) when a.wh_id is not null then isnull(d.wh_name, a.wh_id) end s_site_name
mapper.select:
select
from TB_INV_SRL a left join TB_INV_MATERIAL b on b.mat_no = a.mat_no left join TB_SITE_MAIN c on c.site_id = a.site_id left join TB_INV_WAREHOUSE d on d.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP e on e.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and e.code = cast(a.mat_status as varchar(50)) where a.srl_no = #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_INV_SRL (srl_no, wh_id, mat_no, ven_sn, fa_no, rcv_date, mat_status, site_id, discard_date, discard_no, cr_user, cr_time, md_user, md_time, tag_no ) values (#{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ven_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fa_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcv_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discard_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{discard_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tag_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

wh_id = #{record.wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where srl_no = #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: Select * From TB_INV_SRL LEFT JOIN TB_INV_TXN ON TB_INV_SRL.srl_no = TB_INV_TXN.srl_no Where TB_INV_TXN.txn_type='3' And TB_INV_TXN.qty!=0 And TB_INV_TXN.txn_no = #{trNo} And TB_INV_TXN.mat_no = #{matNo} And TB_INV_TXN.tr_dtl_no = #{dtlNo}
